imdb_user_reviews.contents: I couldn't give it a zero.
Probably the worst movie I've ever seen
every cliché in modern horror movies rolled up into a painful hour and a half
Utterly ridiculous...and not in a good way.
A bad film is a bad film
This film needs to be chainsaw massacred.
An Excess Devoid of Thought or Merit
Sacrilegious but Horror is suppose to take on the sacred
Predictable, full of clichés, but surprisingly satisfying.
For a movie called "Texas Chainsaw Massacre", there isn't a whole lot of Chainsaw Massacreing
Absolute Crap ... Don;t waste your time.
A badly written but passionately pulled off piece of absurdity
Not bad as a horror film, just generic.
A good remake? Yes. A Good Film? Not really.
The Original 1974 movie remains to be the only good TCM film
Maybe Heather should read the letter straight away
Would have been entertainingly palatable if not let down by a lazy oversight.
About as scary as fresh apple pie round your mad Granny's house on a Sunday
A good typical slasher that takes a nosedive
It could have been a contender
An hour and a half of people being cut up. Lot of gore little story. If that's what your into you will like this. I say C.
Would have worked more as a comedy
Even the Die-Hards had to know what they were getting into.
Turns out Leatherface isn't the only simple character in this film
It was OK, seemed more like a comedy than horror
A Brutally Fun Re-boot. A Healthy dose of action meant for classic horror fans
Definitely no Gunnar Hansen by any means, but perhaps the most brutal Leatherface yet?
I wish I can saw this movie in half. Keep the first half, tossed the second half, away and rewrite it. It's really that bad.
Gets more flack than it deserves, but definitely isn't great
This film is wrong in so many ways, yet I don't completely hate it.
The saw has been taken off the shelf...
Not something Hitchcock would commend but still pretty good

why  this  film is  so bad

a clear step in the right direction
An absolute blast from beginning to end!
Chix Chat on Film Review: Leatherface resurfaces.

Oh wow. Texas Chainsaw 3D was a complete and utter waste of what could have been a fun slasher movie.

really dumb yet still bloody fun horror sequel.

A great Chainsaw adventure, nice scenery & stunning main actress
It reminds me of that old Star Wars quote...

what a dissopiontment, the worst chainsaw movie since 'the next generation'
